thread.title: 'Girl Meets World' Previews Musical Sequence From Halloween Episode
thread.title_full: 'Girl Meets World' Previews Musical Sequence From Halloween Episode

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Girl Meets World' Previews Musical Sequence From Halloween Episode
text:
Comments The upcoming special which is also a crossover with 'Austin and Ally' will bring Riley and Maya to meet the Ghost of the Bay Window. 
A musical number and an " Austin & Ally " crossover are coming at the same time on " Girl Meets World " this October. E! News has obtained a sneak peek from an upcoming Halloween-themed episode of the "Boy Meets World" spin-off, showing the teens singing and dancing in vintage costumes. In "Girl Meets World of Terror 2", Riley and Maya meet the Ghost of the Bay Window, a flapper girl from the 1920's, who makes people sing and dance. The special episode will air this Friday, October 2, at 8:30 P.M. on Disney Channel. The network is planning another crossover of its series as Rowan Blanchard and Peyton Meyer of "Girl Meets World" are set to appear in an October 4 episode of "Best Friends Whenever". Still in the spirit of the Halloween, the story will see the girls stuck in a haunted house with Cyd (Landry Bender) and Shelby (Lauren Taylor).
